headline.main: First Specifications for the Post-War Order

lead_paragraph: The Memorial Day address of Mr. Sumner Welles is important and timely because it is the most concrete statement of post-war intentions and policy yet made by a spokesman of this Government. Vice President Wallace delivered a speech May 8 before the Free World Association defining the American war objective as the completion and extension of the American Revolution of 1775.
abstract: A O McCormick comment on Free World Assn s
